thread.title: Tara Palmer Tomkinson was £200,000 in debt when she died | The Independent
thread.title_full: Tara Palmer Tomkinson was £200,000 in debt when she died | The Independent

author: Samuel Osborne
title: Tara Palmer Tomkinson was £200,000 in debt when she died | The Independent
text:
Tara Palmer Tomkinson was £200,000 in debt when she died 
The 45-year-old had set up online boutique company Desiderata last year Sunday 12 February 2017 11:17 GMT Click to followThe Independent Culture 
Former London socialite Tara Palmer-Tomkinson was nearly £200,000 in debt when she died, according to her high-end fashion company's accounts. 
The 45-year-old, who was found dead at her London flat last week, had set up her online boutique company Desiderata last year. 
The accounts, reported in The Sunday Times , show Palmer-Tomkinson was 193,000 in debt when she died. 
She had already ploughed more than £380,000 into the label. Tara Palmer-Tomkinson dies: Celebrities pay tribute 
While Palmer-Tomkinson's death is not being treated as suspicious, few details surrounding her passing have been made public. 
She had been battling a brain tumour discovered by doctors last January. 
They found the tumour in her pituitary gland and further tests revealed she was suffering from a rare auto-immune condition. 
It has been reported that a "very loud bang" was heard coming from her flat five days before her body was discovered. Her death is being treated as unexplained but not suspicious ( Getty ) Read more
